design_system.name: Sci-Fi Command Center
design_system.description: A high-contrast, futuristic interface designed for IT professionals. It combines the utility of a tactical dashboard with the immersion of a sci-fi command deck. The voice agent is the hero, represented by a living, pulsing energy orb.

layout_strategies.grid_system: Bento Grid - Asymmetrical, modular panels floating in void space.
layout_strategies.container_style: Glassmorphism with technical borders. Use 'backdrop-blur-xl' and 'border-white/10' or 'border-cyan-500/20'.
layout_strategies.spacing: Generous. Use 'p-6' or 'p-8' inside cards. Gap 'gap-6' between modules.
visual_decorations: Corner accents (SVG brackets at corners of panels)

VoiceOrb.description: The central interaction point. A CSS/Framer Motion animated sphere/orb.

states.idle: Slow breathing animation (scale 1 to 1.05), soft blue glow.
states.listening: Fast ripple effect, expanding outward rings. Color shifts to intense Cyan.
states.processing: Rapid rotation or indeterminate spinner. Color shifts to Purple.
states.speaking: Audio visualizer bars or waveform modulation. Color shifts to Green or dynamic gradient.

VoiceOrb.interaction: Click to toggle listening. Must have a large 'hit area'.

TicketPanel.style: HUD-style list. Each ticket is a row with a 'status pill' that glows.
TicketPanel.visuals: Use 'font-mono' for IDs. Status badges should use 'shadow-[0_0_10px_currentColor]'.

TranscriptFeed.style: Terminal-like scrolling feed. User text aligned right (Cyan), AI text aligned left (White/Gray).
TranscriptFeed.animation: Typewriter effect for new AI responses.

background_texture.description: Abstract flowing dark blue texture for subtle background overlay (low opacity).
background_texture.usage: Global background overlay with mix-blend-mode: overlay

hero_orb_reference.description: Visual reference for the central orb glow and color.

server_room.usage: Login page background or KB section header

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts. Use asymmetrical grids.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
MUST NOT apply universal transition (transition: all).
MUST NOT center align the app container text-align: center.
Always use modern button styles (pill-shaped or sharp technical).
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters (ðŸ¤–, ðŸ§ , etc.).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures and noise overlays are mandatory.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SCAFFOLD: Set up Tailwind with the custom colors and fonts defined above.
2. ORB: Build the 'VoiceOrb' component first. It is the heart of the app. Make it feel 'alive'.
3. LAYOUT: Create a 'DashboardLayout' that positions the Orb centrally (or top-center) and uses a CSS Grid for the flanking panels (Tickets, KB).
4. VISUALS: Add a global 'noise' overlay to the body to prevent banding on the dark background.
5. DATA: Mock the ticket data with 'tech' sounding issues (e.g., 'Mainframe Uplink Error', 'Quantum Node Desync').
6. MICRO-INTERACTIONS: Add hover states to every interactive element. Buttons should glow or have a 'glitch' effect on hover.
